message: I don't understand why you gave me "no answer" when I have written 2 pages of literature review on Interaction Design including theories from Norman, Dourish, and Buxton
It appears you must have handed in the wrong assignment then. What I'm seeing is only 1 page with an introduction and a brief summary of methodologies.
This is clearly not true. I checked my hand-in and everything is fine. All the pages are there. I request for a revision of the grade given here by grader #1.
